dct_title_s: Imperii Persici in omnes suas provincias: (tam veteribus quam modernis erundem nominibus signatas) exacte divisi nova tabula geographica, quam ex precipuis Olearii, Tavernieri, Relandi aliorumque recentium authorum scriptis concinnatam; Io. Baptista Homann.
dct_description_sm: Map no. 83 from vol. 1 of "Atlas novus terrarum orbis," by J.B. Homann. Also in "Atlas Maior" by R. Ottens. Decorative cartouche and illustration. 1 map: hand col.; 47 X 56 cm
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
